data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Ntchisi, Malawi.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ntchisi, Malawi
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 9,400 citizens of Ntchisi, Malawi, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Ntchisi, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Ntchisi who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Swahili people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Swahili people.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Ntchisi. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Ntchisi, Malawi to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ntchisi, Malawi has a population of 9,400.

We estimate Ntchisi has 1,599 people who might know Jesus, 5,515 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,286 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Ntchisi.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.
